title: QLS Classic: Greg Phillinganes (Part 1)
itunes:title: QLS Classic: Greg Phillinganes (Part 1)
description:
In part 1 of 2, prolific music director, singer-songwriter & session musician talks about collaborating with Michael Jackson, his extracurricular activities on the BAD tour and being Stevie Wonder's wingman on keys.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
